app_title: Anna Koval, Leo Maxwell, Nina Patel (DM) - DataSystems - Team Chat App
visual_description: The screenshot shows a Team Chat App conversation. On the left is the main conversation window with messages from Leo Maxwell, Nina Patel, and Alex. On the right is a 'Thread' window with replies to Alex's message. The messages contain text, emojis, and timestamps. Below the main conversation is a message input field with formatting options and an area where users can type a message. The 'Thread' window shows replies from Alex and Leo Maxwell, along with a reply input field.
